short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code Geass Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Code Geass background. Code Geass wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Code Geass wallpaper each time a new tab is opened.
2. Choose a random Code Geass background or select favorites in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick link to start playing games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Code Geass new tab.
